description: Program to align one dataset (the 'source') to a 'base' dataset using an affine (matrix) transformation of space.

param_save.title: 1D Parameters Save file
param_save.description: Save the warp parameters in ASCII (.1D) format into file

param_apply.title: 1D Parameters Apply file
param_apply.description: Read warp parameters from file and apply them to the source dataset

matrix_save.title: 1D Matrix Save file
matrix_save.description: Save the transformation matrix for each sub-brick into file

matrix_apply.title: 1D Matrix Apply file
matrix_apply.description: Use the matrices in file to define the spatial transformations to be applied

cost.title: Cost function
cost.description: Defines the 'cost' function that defines the matching between the source and the base

interp.title: Interpolation method
interp.description: Defines interpolation method to use during matching process

final.title: Final interpolation mode
final.description: Defines the interpolation mode used to create the output dataset

nmatch.title: Number of match points
nmatch.description: Use at most 'nnn' scattered points to match the datasets

nopad.title: No padding flag
nopad.description: Do not use zero-padding on the base image
